definition: a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation

pinyin: yi4 bu4 chuan2 shu1 mo2 shi4

sentences.english: However, asynchronous interaction pushes more complex error handling onto the consumer.
sentences.chinese: 然而，異步交互將更復雜的錯誤處理推給了用戶。

sentences.english: With an asynchronous model, the queue itself acts as a relief valve.
sentences.chinese: 藉助異步模型，隊列本身可以充當一個減壓閥。

sentences.english: Alas it is also well known that asynchronous techniques require an inelegant or downright clumsy series of callbacks.
sentences.chinese: 但同時大家也都知道異步技術要求一系列笨重的回調。

sentences.english: Answers are guaranteed with exception-handling and error-recovery mechanisms.
sentences.chinese: 可以通過異步處理和錯誤恢復機制保證得到應答。

sentences.english: Speed control of induction motor based on passivity theory p.
sentences.chinese: 基於無源性理論的異步電機的轉速控制。

sentences.english: The current control is one of the kernel problems of induction motor field oriented control (FOC).
sentences.chinese: 電流控制是異步電機磁場定向控制的核心問題之一。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the soft-start of the asynchronous motors.
sentences.chinese: 文章對異步電動機軟啓動做了分析。

sentences.english: Three papular approaches to IM speed identification are compared in simulation.
sentences.chinese: 分析比較了當前主要的三種異步電機速度辨識方法。

sentences.english: The introduction of standardised support for asynchronous HTTP requests and responses.
sentences.chinese: 引入了對異步HTTP請求和響應的標準化支持。

sentences.english: How much time is saved by the asynchrony in this plan?
sentences.chinese: 在這個計劃中，異步節省了多少時間呢？

sentences.english: The intermediate buffer on the write side allows the write to complete asynchronously.
sentences.chinese: 在寫入方面的中間緩衝區則可以讓寫入過程異步完成。

sentences.english: In general, asynchronous dispatching is required in only one of these implementations.
sentences.chinese: 一般地，在這些實現中只有一個需要異步分派。

sentences.english: A method of designing asynchronous sequential circuits is presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出異步時序電路的設計方法。

sentences.english: An asynchronous electrical signal from a peripheral to the processor.
sentences.chinese: 一個從外設到處理器的異步電信號。

sentences.english: Some invocations can be done synchronously, some asynchronously.
sentences.chinese: 有些調用可以同步進行，另一些則異步進行。

sentences.english: In this code you see the asynchronous version of your interface being called.
sentences.chinese: 在這段代碼中，您看到了被調用接口的異步版本。
